story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo scored 44 out of 100. Grassroots tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo?

broll_sources.query: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo gravel race

beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo. Francis Marion National Forest, South Carolina. 65 mi. Flat coastal forest gravel with minimal elevation.
beats.text_on_screen: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo | Francis Marion National Forest, South Carolina | 65 mi

broll_sources.query: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo route map
Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo course walkthrough

beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Fourteen dimensions. Here's where it lands. Length. 3 out of 5. Long enough to matter. Short enough to recover. 65 miles creates solid endurance challenge with 5-hour cutoffs for the shorter option. Experience. 3 out of 5. You'll remember this one. Mostly fondly. Francis Marion's Revolutionary War history and weekend festival atmosphere create memorable experiences beyond racing. Community. 3 out of 5. Community is a real selling point. Post-race atmosphere encourages riders to "hangout in the finish area and share their stories of #gravelfreedom" around food trucks serving empanadas and Filipino cuisine. Value. 3 out of 5. Fair value. You get what you pay for. $175 entry includes finisher awards, post-event food, and access to multi-day programming from Friday brewery events to Sunday recovery rides. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Mid-range expenses. Budget a proper race weekend. Logistics. 2 out of 5. Basic setup. Don't expect hand-holding. Registration caps at 300 riders across all distances, but organizers warn "We no longer mark our courses. Technicality. 2 out of 5. Some chunky bits. Nothing catastrophic. Climate. 2 out of 5. Weather cooperates more often than not. March 2025 conditions were ideal with "absolutely perfect temperature - a balmy 60 degrees with light wind and a bit of fog/mist in the air.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The rest, in rapid succession. Adventure. 2 out of 5. Mild adventure. Scenic ride with a number plate. Prestige. 2 out of 5. Regional reputation. The locals know. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Basic but functional. Gets the job done. Field Depth. 2 out of 5. Enough competition to keep you honest. Elevation. 1 out of 5. Elevation gain measured in speed bumps. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Low altitude. Breathe easy.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.narration: Where Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo earns its score.
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment

Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo race highlights

beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: Travel, lodging, and the unsexy details.

broll_sources.query: Francis Marion National Forest, South Carolina travel guide
Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo race day

beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Lodging: Charleston area has good lodging options.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: South Carolina Coastal Forest Gravel. If you're in South Carolina and want a flat forest event. yes, it's solid. If you're from out of state or want climbing. look elsewhere.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo isn't quite right for you. For better SC events: Gran Fondo Hincapie, Race to Valhalla. For similar flat events: other coastal gravel races.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.
